name: get_result_from_category
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool taboo_api.
Tool description: Provides a number of different categories to choose from. You can get a random word and its taboo words or you can get taboo words for the word or phrase you provide.
API description: Given a stored category, get a random result which will contain the main phrase and the taboo words.

Optionally pass a parameter which will control the amount of taboo words to be returned, "forbiddenWordLimit" defaults to 4 and has a max of 10

category.description: The category from which to fetch the result.

forbiddenwordlimit.description: The number of taboo words to be returned, defaults to 5 and has a maximum of 10.
